subject: Fix sample images path - remove duplicate BASE_URL
body:
Sample images weren't loading on GitHub Pages because BASE_URL was being
added twice: once in sampleImages.js config and again in MediaTab.jsx.

- Remove BASE_URL from sampleImages.js, use relative paths instead
- MediaTab.jsx now correctly adds BASE_URL when constructing URLs
- Documented in AI_MISTAKES.md (issue reported 7+ times)

https://claude.ai/code/session_01DpewDb8qpm7TSo42NKqCjZ
title: Fix sample images path - remove duplicate BASE_URL
